Package com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.queue

Interface DQueue

public interface DQueue
Represents a Queue loaded on the server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    The bet amount for this DQueue.

    An UnmodifiableList of Players playing in this queue.

  • Method Details

    • getKit

      @Nullable Kit getKit()
      The Kit set for this DQueue.
      Returns:
      Kit set for this DQueue or null if no kit was set.

    • getBet

      int getBet()
      The bet amount for this DQueue.
      Returns:
      Bet amount for this DQueue or 0 if no bet was specified.

    • isInQueue

      boolean isInQueue(@NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Whether or not the given Player is in this DQueue.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to check if in this DQueue. Must not be null!
      Returns:
      True if player is in this DQueue. False otherwise.

    • getQueuedPlayers

      @NotNull List<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getQueuedPlayers()
      An UnmodifiableList of Players in this queue.
      Returns:
      Never-null UnmodifiableList of Players in this queue.

    • getPlayersInMatch

      @NotNull long getPlayersInMatch()
      An UnmodifiableList of Players playing in this queue.
      Returns:
      Never-null UnmodifiableList of Players playing in this queue.

    • isRemoved

      boolean isRemoved()
      Whether or not this DQueue has been removed.
      Returns:
      True if this DQueue has been removed. False otherwise.
      See Also:
      • DQueueManager.remove(Kit, int)
